name: Parasite Pandemonium
description:
Created as a final PDL project for a procedural generation class at UT. Parasite Pandemonium has you play as a space man, whose ship is under attack by parasites with the ability to rewrite reality. Defeat all of them in time to save yourself, or be lost forever in their creation. 

Features procedural room generation, enemy and item spawns, and stats. Also features player selected start settings, random seed input to predetermine generation consistently, and a simple scoring mechanic to keep competition lively.

Presentation (with some more details): https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1MEzVWBpfmwDffi_bVZ1uR6Zeoe2ws6OA6rJNBGTv...
